title: Swap $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: Replace f(x) with $$y$$ and swap $$x$$ and $$y$$ in the equation.

title: Move the constant term to the other side
text: Subtract $$9$$ from both sides to isolate the squared term.

title: Take the square root
text: After isolating $$x^2$$, take the square root of both sides, considering the domain.
